title: Liberal Democrats Retract Letter to Pursue Ukraine Ceasefire
description: One day after issuing a letter urging President Biden to seek direct diplomatic talks with Russia, progressives withdrew that appeal. The move reflected deepening divisions over the conflict.
dc:creator: Catie Edmondson
media:credit: Gabriela Bhaskar for The New York Times
media:description: Representative Pramila Jayapal of Washington, the letterâ€™s principal author, faulted unnamed aides for releasing the letter.
